profile_positions.description: Vice-principal Royal Conservatoire The Hague (www.koncon.nl), the Netherlands, responsible for curriculum development, research, quality assurance and international relations
profile_positions.title: Vice Principal

profile_positions.description: The Council is the Board of the AEC.
profile_positions.title: Member of the AEC Council
Member Intenational Artist Advisory Council College of Music
Member Quality Enhancement Committee Yong Siew Toh Conservatory

profile_positions.description: Chair of the Board of MusiQuE, an independent European agency for quality enhancement and accreditation in music
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the Board

profile_positions.description: Chief Executive of the European Association of Conservatoires (AEC), responsible for policy development, fundraising, project implementation, financial management and lobby activities at European level
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description: Consultant for European Affairs for European Association of Conservatoires (AEC), responsible for fundraising and lobby activities at European level.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
* Solo appearances with professional and semi-professional orchestras in cello concertos by Dvořák, Haydn, Vivaldi, Saint-Saëns, Martinů and Boccherini
* Assistant principal cellist European Union Chamber Orchestra with extensive tours in Europe, Asia, Middle East, Canada and Middle/South America
* Cellist in Salzburg Chamber Soloists with extensive tours in Europe
* Cellist in ensemble ‘Camerata Antonio Lucio’ with violinist Emmy Verheij
* Performances and radio broadcasts with clarinet quartet ‘Abime’
* Freelance cellist in various Dutch and international orchestras
profile_positions.title: Cellist
